job.title: SAP ABAP Software Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Staffing and Recruiting,Hospital & Health Care
job.description: Cerebral Staffing, LLC is seeking a <strong>SAP ABAP Software Engineer</strong> to work at our direct client <strong>John Deere in Moline, IL.<br><br></strong>SAP ABAP with focus on FICO and Sales &amp; Distribution (SD)<br><br>Required Skills:<br><ul><li>5+ years of experience in developing using core SAP ABAP. This includes using OOP and all SAP enhancement techniques</li><li>2+ years of experience in HANA data modeling using Hana Studio. This includes creating and maintaining attribute, analytic and calculation views</li><li>2+ years of experience in development using Fiori/UI5</li><li>2+ years of experience working with IDocs, Proxies, and Webservices</li><li>2+ years of experience in developing in Gateway, and OData technologies</li><li>2+ years of functional and technical experience in FICO and SD modules<br><br></li></ul><strong><u>Desired Skills/Experience<br></u></strong><ul><li>1+ years of experience configuring, developing, and/or troubleshooting PI interfaces</li><li>1+ years of functional and technical experience the following core SAP modules SD, FICO and MM.</li><li>1+ years of experience in cloud development with platforms like AWS, Azure, SAP Cloud Platform</li><li>1+ years of experience working with agile software design methodology for development and documentation<br></li></ul><strong>Cerebral Staffing offers health/vision/dental insurance, Paid Holiday/PTO short-time disability, 401k and paid life insurance<br><br></strong>Powered by JazzHR<br><br>jNaIdRZsdV
